Question: Dongguan Juli Composite Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Juli Composite Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Carbon Fiber Tubes, Sheets, and Rods

- Specializes in manufacturing quality fiber-reinforced polymer/plastic (FRP) products through pultrusion, pullwinding, and roll-wrapping processes
- Offers a wide range of carbon fiber products including pultruded GFRP, CFRP, and KFRP rods, tubes, strips, complex profiles, pullwound and roll-wrapped tubes in various dimensions
- Utilizes different reinforcements such as glass fiber, carbon fiber, and fiberglass-carbonfiber hybrid, along with resin matrixes including polyester, Vinyl ester, Epoxy, and polyurethane
- Extensively applicable in construction, sports, electronics, medical equipment, and model toys
- Factory covers an area of about 5,000 square meters with five production departments and nearly 75 employees
- Plans to complete the relocation of the new factory before May 31st next year, with the planned area reaching eight thousand square meters and an increase in the number of employees to about 150
Summary_cn:
东莞市捷立复合科技有限公司

产品：碳纤维管，板和杆

- 专业生产质量优良的纤维增强聚合物/塑料（FRP）产品，采用拉挤、拉绕和卷裹等工艺
- 提供广泛的碳纤维产品，包括拉挤玻璃纤维增强聚合物（GFRP）、碳纤维增强聚合物（CFRP）和碳纤维增强聚合物复合玻璃纤维（KFRP）杆、管、带、复杂型材，以及拉绕和卷裹管材，尺寸多样
- 采用玻璃纤维、碳纤维和玻璃纤维-碳纤维混杂物等不同增强材料，以及聚酯、酯类树脂、环氧和聚氨酯等不同树脂基体
- 广泛适用于建筑、体育、电子、医疗设备和模型玩具等领域
- 工厂占地约5,000平方米，设有五个生产部门，近75名员工
- 计划于明年5月31日前完成新工厂的搬迁工作，计划占地面积达到8,000平方米，员工数量增加至约150人
